member.name: T:CambridgeSoft.COE.Framework.TempHitListCreateRequestInfo
member.summary: Contains information creating a temp hitlist. This is derived from the HitListRequestInfoBase. XMLIgnore attributes are added to some of the fields that can not be created by the client. For example, Date_Created, ID, Name (which is always TEMP) and number of hits.

member.name: T:CambridgeSoft.COE.Framework.HitListResponseInfoItemBase
member.summary: Contains all the fields in the csdohitlistid entity. This works for userhitlistid as well as all of the fields are the same with the exemption of userhitlistid.tempid which is a FK reference to a temporary hitlist. This information is never returned.

member.name: T:CambridgeSoft.COE.Framework.HitListResponseInfoItem
member.summary: Contains information about a hitlist returned the HitListResponseInfo object when the request has indicated that datareturn is ArrayOfItems rather then DataSet

member.summary: enumeration representing the available hitlist operations

member.name: F:CambridgeSoft.COE.Framework.HitListOperationTypeEnum.None
member.remarks: represents that no hitlist operation is performed

member.name: F:CambridgeSoft.COE.Framework.HitListOperationTypeEnum.Subtract
member.remarks: represents that a hitlist shoul be subtracted from another

member.name: F:CambridgeSoft.COE.Framework.HitListOperationTypeEnum.Union
member.remarks: represents that a hitlist should be combined with another

member.name: F:CambridgeSoft.COE.Framework.HitListOperationTypeEnum.Intersect
member.remarks: represents that a hitlist should be substracted with another

member.summary: default parameterless constructor

member.name: T:CambridgeSoft.COE.Framework.UserHitListUpdateRequestInfo
member.summary: Contains information updating a saved hitlist. This is derived from the HitListRequestInfoBase. XMLIgnore attributes are added to some of the fields that can not be created by the client. For example, Date_Created, id, userID and NumberHits The only fields that can be updated are name, description and isPublic.

member.summary: General purpose search method

member.summary: An integer field type. This can be an integer, a shor or another integer database types.

member.name: F:CambridgeSoft.COE.Framework.Common.DataView.AbstractTypes.Real
member.summary: An real field type. This can be a float, a double or another real database types.

member.name: F:CambridgeSoft.COE.Framework.Common.DataView.AbstractTypes.Text
member.summary: A text field type. This can be a text, a varchar, a char or other Text database types.

member.name: F:CambridgeSoft.COE.Framework.Common.DataView.AbstractTypes.Date
member.summary: A date field type. This can be a DateTime, a Date or other Date database types.

member.name: F:CambridgeSoft.COE.Framework.Common.DataView.AbstractTypes.Boolean
member.summary: A boolean field type. This can be a bit or other boolean database type.

member.summary: Used in commands like WhereClauseLike to determine where to apply the wildcards

member.summary: Wildcard will be applied at the left side.

member.name: F:CambridgeSoft.COE.Framework.Common.SearchCriteria.Positions.Right
member.summary: Wildcard will be applied at the right side.

member.name: F:CambridgeSoft.COE.Framework.Common.SearchCriteria.Positions.Both
member.summary: Wildcard will be applied both sides (left AND right).

member.name: F:CambridgeSoft.COE.Framework.Common.SearchCriteria.Positions.None
member.summary: There will be no wildcard.

member.summary: Contains information updating a temp hitlist. This is derived from the HitListRequestInfoBase. XMLIgnore attributes are added to some of the fields that can not be created by the client. member.summary: interface for role manager service

member.name: T:CambridgeSoft.COE.Framework.MarkedHitListSearchRequestInfo
member.summary: Contains information about a marked hits hitlist for searching. This is derived from the HitListRequestInfoBase. XMLIgnore attributes is added to the name field which for marked hits is alwasy "USERHITLIST";

member.name: T:CambridgeSoft.COE.Framework.HitListSearchRequestInfo
member.summary: Contains information about a hitlist for searching. This is derived from the HitListRequestInfoBase. XMLIgnore attributes are added to fields that are not to be passed with the object for the targeted purpose. For this object, it is the same as the base, so not additions or substractions in the class are made.

member.name: T:CambridgeSoft.COE.Framework.HitListResponseInfo
member.summary: Contains information about a hitlist
